## What is the [#30DayChartChallenge?](https://github.com/30DayChartChallenge/Edition2025)

As stated on the site, "The #30DayChartChallenge is a community-driven challenge that happens each year during April. Every day, there is a certain prompt, grouped into five categories: comparisons, distributions, relationships, time series, and uncertainties. Anyone is welcome to contribute, no matter which data source or tool is used to create the visualizations." 

April 2023 was my first go at the challenge and I found the overall experience to be really inspiring and creative! Below are my 5️⃣ contributions. Check out [this blog post](https://waterdata.usgs.gov/blog/chart-challenge-2023/) that highlights all [\@USGS_DataSci](https://twitter.com/USGS_DataSci) contributions.
